resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104063</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104063</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209770</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bloom Clock Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blüte Taktgeber-Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet d'Horloge de Fleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto Do Pulso de disparo Da Flor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto Dell'Orologio Della Fioritura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα "Ενδείξεων ώρασ" άνθισης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyecto Del Reloj De la Floración</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The Bloom Clock Project is an attempt to create a language for discussing the bloom times of wildflowers and other plants that is neutral in respect to climate, region, and hemisphere. This language will take a few years to develop as it depends on a large pool of data.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Blüte Taktgeber-Projekt ist ein Versuch, eine
Sprache für das Behandeln der Blüte Zeiten von wildflowers und von 
anderen Betrieben zu erstellen, das in bezug auf Klima, Region und 
Hemisphäre Null ist. Diese Sprache dauert einige Jahre, um sich
zu entwickeln, während sie von einem großen Pool von Daten abhängt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le projet d'horloge de fleur est une tentative de 
créer un langage pour discuter les temps de fleur des wildflowers et 
d'autres usines qui est neutre en ce qui concerne le climat, la 
région, et l'hémisphère. Ce langage prendra quelques années 
pour se développer pendant qu'il dépend d'un grand regroupement des 
données.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O projeto do pulso de disparo da flor é uma 
tentativa de criar uma língua para discutir os tempos da flor dos 
wildflowers e das outras plantas que é neutro no respeito ao clima, 
à região, e ao hemisfério. Esta língua fará exame de alguns
anos para tornar-se enquanto depende de um pool grande dos dados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il progetto dell'orologio della fioritura è un 
tentativo di creare un linguaggio per la discussione dei tempi della 
fioritura dei wildflowers e di altre piante che è neutra per quanto 
riguarda il clima, la regione e l'emisfero. Questo linguaggio 
occorrerà alcuni anni per svilupparsi mentre dipende da un grande 
stagno dei dati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρόγραμμα "Ενδείξεων ώρασ" άνθισης είναι μια 
προσπάθεια να δημιουργηθεί μια γλώσσα για τη συζήτηση των χρόνων 
άνθισης των wildflowers και άλλων εγκαταστάσεων που είναι 
ουδέτερη όσον αφορά το κλίμα, την περιοχή, και το ημισφαίριο. 
Αυτή η γλώσσα θα διαρκέσει μερικά έτη που αναπτύσσονται 
όπως εξαρτάται από μια μεγάλη ομάδα των στοιχείων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El proyecto del reloj de la floración es una 
tentativa de crear un lenguaje para discutir los tiempos de la 
floración de wildflowers y de otras plantas que es neutral por lo que
se refiere a clima, a la región, y al hemisferio. Este lenguaje
tomará algunos años para convertirse mientras que depende de una 
piscina grande de datos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209770</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">GNU Free Documentation License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104063</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/bloom-clock-project</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
